name: quotes
description: Display one of my favorite quotes

scripts.build: browserify load-quote.js -v | uglifyjs -v > bundle.js && git add bundle.js && git commit -m 'Build bundle.js'
scripts.deploy: git checkout gh-pages && git merge --no-edit master && npm run build && git push && git checkout -

author: David Ernst <npm@dsernst.com> (http://dsernst.com)
